TEXT.TITLE: VIDEO SHOPPING MALL ADDS FLORIDA STATION
TEXT.BODY: <Video Shopping Mall Inc> said it signed WJTC-TV, Pensacola, Fla, to carry its self-improvement and specialized business opportunity programs. Video Shopping said the station, carried over UHF channel 44 in the Pensacola area, reaches about 120,000 households. Reuter
